Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Removed public name
11.04.2007 SH SCR12431 Changed MSEG_ID from PH0103 to PH0279 to
ask to build new index (wrong message text was used)
21.07.2006 SH SCR11614 Added update BTCP_ROWCHANGEDBYUSRID = user(0)
14.02.2006 SH SCR10397 Added new HYPB fields
23.08.2005 Added storing of HYPA_ID/DEPARTMENTNAME to BADP/CHQE/DRFT
06.12.2004 SH SCR7466 Added message to inform user about new scanning index and
changed parameter to use SelectParameter
19.04.2004 SH SCR6030 Update HYPB_ADMNO = ADMN_ADMNOGLPACKAGE if
- ADMN_DELCREDERE = 'Y', else with BTPC_ADMNO
-- SCR#478 --> OK 13.12.2001 SH (Change HYPB_DOCTYP from 12 to 912)
-- SCR#752 --> OK 04.02.2002 SH (Send HYPB_BATCHNO back to OPH101B)
-- SCR#861 20.02.2002 SH (Part, build new index implemented)
-- First check if already documents scanned, BTCH_HYPB_BATCHNO > 0
-- If documents already scanned, asked user to build new index
-- If a new index has to be built, the existing HYPB rows for the BTCH row
-- have to be deleted
-- Generate new batchnumber for storing HYPB-rows, if a new index
-- has to build
-- Use old HYPB_BATCH_NO, do not build new index
-- Store new HYPB_BATCH_NO in BADT, if HYPB rows created
-- Send users message that 'Scanning index prepared'
-- No updates has to be made, if there are already documents scanned
-- and the user doesn't wants to build a new index, see alos EndTaskCondition
-- Store new HYPA_ID for the actual BTCP row, if it's empty and
-- documents have to be scanned
-- Store lines in tabel HYPB for every BTCP row which has to be scanned
-- increase v.HYPB_LINENO with 1 to make a unique key
